Posts.Content: Hi Judy, we have mets in the same places. May I know what meds you are taking now and have you been on other meds before? I’m on Ibrance and Faslodex now. I’ve not known of others here who have mets to mediastinal nodes so I’m interested to know your treatment plan. I have mets to mediastinal and hilar lymph nodes, right lung and pleura. Maria
Posts.Title: Coughing

Posts.Content: Thank you for sharing your feelings. Many times, I too have questioned if all the anxiety, pain and disappointments are worth it. But when I think of my husband and children and when I get good scan results, suddenly my thoughts change to “yes I want to live.” You wrote so beautifully and from the heart. I can somehow feel your pain and absolutely get you because I too am on Faslodex and Ibrance. I dread the monthly injections because I still have hematoma from a few months back yet when I get my scan results showing the Faslodex and Ibrance are still working, I am so happy and think that yes, the injections and pain are worth it. Maria
Posts.Title: Choosing Life

Posts.Content: Thanks for the reply Judy. I was on Letrozole for 5 years before I was diagnosed with mediastinal and lung mets. I don’t know what my next line of treatment will be after Ibrance fails. I hope it keeps me stable for a long time to come. Hope we do okay for a long time. take care and God bless! Maria
Posts.Title: Coughing
